subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Two months into the season, Mark Teixeira is no longer battling his perennial slow start. He is struggling, hitting .236 in 72 right-handed at-bats and .199 in 151 left-handed at-bats.
snippet: Two months into the season, Mark Teixeira is no longer battling his perennial slow start. He is struggling, hitting .236 in 72 right-handed at-bats and .199 in 151 left-handed at-bats.
